hero.title: Our Products
hero.description: Discover our world of conscious craft

categories.title: Kidswear
categories.description: Wrap your little one in love, comfort, and culture. Our kidswear collection is made from breathable, naturally dyed cottons using traditional Indian textiles like Ajrakh, block prints, and hand‑woven fabrics. From rompers to dresses, every piece is gentle on delicate skin and designed for play and sleep.

categories.title: Pet Wear
categories.description: Hand‑crafted pet wear blending comfort, durability, and cultural charm. Made with soft, toxin‑free cottons and prints, each piece is lightweight, breathable, and easy to wear—keeping companions cozy and stylish while supporting artisan livelihoods.

categories.title: Pet Beds
categories.description: Every pet deserves a soft place to land. Our beds are filled with hypoallergenic stuffing and lined with love. Sustainable, breathable, and built to last—just like the bond with your pet.
